/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy streets. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the earthy tones of the buildings below. The buildings themselves are made of brick and concrete, their facades adorned with signs and advertisements, hinting at the commercial nature of the area. The street is lined with trees and power lines, adding a touch of greenery to the urban landscape. Cars and trucks are scattered along the road, indicating the constant movement and energy of the city. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
